name: Pizza
instructions: Roll out pizza dough with a rolling pin into a 12 inch circle.
Coat the dough with a layer of pizza/marinara sauce, leaving 1/2 inch of the edges uncoated for crust.
Place a layer of mozarella cheese on top of the sauce, ensuring to cover the entire pizza.
Put toppings of your choice on top of the cheese. For spinach or other temperature-sensitive toppings, add as garnish after baking.
Bake at 500F for roughly 10 mins, or until cheese has golden brown spots and crust is crispy on underside.
Slice pizza and enjoy!

name: Penne with Marinara
instructions: Bring 4 quarts of salted water to a boil, set timer for 10 mins and put pasta in water.
Strain pasta when timer expires.
Mince garlic and onion. Place in a saucepan with olive oil and cook on medium-low until onion translucent.
Add marinara sauce to garlic and onions. Simmer for 10 minutes.
Plate your pasta with marinara sauce and garnish with fresh basil. Top with parmesan cheese for extra flavor!

name: Coconut Chickpea Curry
instructions: On medium-high heat, cook minced onion until translucent, about 6 minutes.
Add minced garlic, 1 tsp. garam masala, 1 tsp. cumin, 1/2 tsp. turmeric, 1/4 tsp. cayenne pepper. Cook for 2 minutes.
Stir in drained chickpeas, coconut milk, 1/2 cup of water and 1 tsp. of salt. Bring to a simmer and hold temperature for 10 minutes.
Add cilantro and lime juice to taste.
Serve over basmati rice with lime wedges on the side for garnish.

name: Fried Rice
instructions: In a bowl, beat the eggs until whites and yolks are incorporated
Place a seasoned wok on high heat. Pour in 1 tablespoon neutral oil and swirl around wok.
Pour in beaten egg. Once it begins to set on the bottom, stir to scramble. Transfer out of wok.
Add more oil, and fry garlic until fragrant. Add scallion whites and fry for 30 more seconds.
Add rice, stirring until piping hot.
Return egg to wok, adding scallions greens. Mix until everything is heated.
Stir vigorously whilte adding soy sauce and sesame oil, pouring them in on the rim of the wok, not the rice.
Top with white pepper and garnish with additional scallion greens. Enjoy!
